<title level="1" right="Rules">[Defense Potency](/Rules.aspx?ID=2746)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 83 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
At 5th level, you gain a +1 potency bonus to AC. At 11th level, this bonus increases to +2, and at 18th level, to +3.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
